class_notes: This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course examines the way the postwar Japanese experience has been reflected (and constructed) through various types of popular media. Through film, television, magazine, newspapers, music, and manga, we will explore the various ways in which Japanese society has narrated its experiences of recovery and rebuilding after World War II, and the role these media sources have played in this reconstruction.
